body:
Most are back to school now, and I'm feeling a little nosey, so I'm gonna ask a few q's:

1. What year/grade are you going into?
2. Are you taking major exams this year?
3. How long do you have left at school?

I am going into British Year 10. I am not taking my GCSE's this year so no major exams. 2 years of secondary school left unless I enter A-Level curriculum.

Bit off topic but why not!

Myv

Myv
title: Back to School

replies.body:
1. Senior year of high school
2. I'll be taking 4 AP exams this year
3. This will be my last year of high school, but I'm currently applying to colleges.

replies.body:
1. 7th Grade (Prepatory class for those going to the Finnish stream)
2. The exam for those going into the English stream for 7th graders (I went 4th place so I didn't get in and that is how I ended up into Prepatory) :(
3. Umm...More than 3 years I suppose :D

1. 7th Grade (Prepatory class for those going to the Finnish stream)
2. The exam for those going into the English stream for 7th graders (I went 4th place so I didn't get in and that is how I ended up into Prepatory) :(
3. Umm...More than 3 years I suppose :D

replies.body:
11th grade, should be out of school but started school a year late, and my parents didnt let me skip a grade (4th) even though i could ;-;
I mean i take a final for every class at the end of each semester does that count?
School started last week so the rest of this year which ends in June, and then all of next year and im done

trying to understand how school works in other countrys is confusing murica ftw

replies.body: 10th grade
replies.body_tagged: 10th grade

replies.body:
1. What year/grade are you going into?
     First week in Year 9; I've spent over two years 'resourcefully' of my life at a secondary grammar school already. SICK
2. Are you taking major exams this year?
     Nope, but have just started studying for the three year GCSE courses I picked.
3. How long do you have left at school?
     I plan on Sixth Form so five more years before I'm out with A-Levels... hopefully.
replies.body_tagged:
1. What year/grade are you going into?
     First week in Year 9; I've spent over two years 'resourcefully' of my life at a secondary grammar school already. SICK
2. Are you taking major exams this year?
     Nope, but have just started studying for the three year GCSE courses I picked.
3. How long do you have left at school?
     I plan on Sixth Form so five more years before I'm out with A-Levels... hopefully.

replies.body:
1. What year/grade are you going into? Y11 / 10th grade, sophomore year
2. Are you taking major exams this year? GCSE's
3. How long do you have left at school? 3 Years
Btw education to 18 is compulsory in UK, if you're not doing A levels you're doing vocationals, apprenticeships.
Just so ya know.

Grade 8/Secondary 2 (think of it as second year of high school idek quebec educational system is weird)

No, but the year after next year will decide where I go to cegep (college)

Counting everything and assuming Ill only get one degree, 4 years of High School, 2 years of cegep and 4 years of university.

replies.body: My summer was 4 months but it was 2 months for me due to I'm getting prepared for an American private school here (best school in turkey). 7 days schooling, summer was 2 months for me, also I don't have ANY holiday or break. 8 months non-stop studying T_T When you have exams everyday you just start enjoying it :p

replies.body:
1. What year/grade are you going into?
Grade 11 (Canadian/US grade system).
2. Are you taking major exams this year?
Apart from the standard post-course exams that we have to take for courses like Maths, English, etc., nope.
3. How long do you have left at school?
1 more year of Secondary school before I go to University & Teacher's college.

replies.body:
Aussie schools started like 2 months ago, rip.
1. I'm in 8th grade. Might be different compared to US system.
2. Nothing major, standard assessments but nothing too big.
3. I have about 4 and a half years left before I'm off to University.
